snippet: As the president closes another year in office, he is seeking to recapture lost momentum and confront the daunting challenges of the midterm election season.
abstract: Pres Obama is shuffling his staff after a tough fifth year in office, to recapture lost momentum and confront daunting challenges of the midterm election season; seeks to recalibrate a White House operation that failed to win passage of most of his top legislative priorities for the year, struggled to preserve his public standing and bungled the rollout of his signature health care program.
lead_paragraph: As the president closes another year in office, he is seeking to recapture lost momentum and confront the daunting challenges of the midterm election season.

headline.main: Shuffling Staff, Obama Strives for a Recharge After a Tough Fifth Year
headline.print_headline: Shuffling Staff, Obama Strives for a Recharge After a Tough Fifth Year
